Author: mole99
Content: You probably have a list of things that still need to be done, but I'll also add my observations here.

Author: mole99
Content:
wafer.space in the top-left corner could use the wafer.space logo.

The background of "Welcome to wafer.space" could be an image like this one: https://wafer.space/assets/images/products/gf180mcu-wafer-isometric.jpg

The localization seems to work only partially. An option to disable it completely would also be nice (in the profile settings?).

Author: mole99
Content: The alignment is off. All "Sign up with" text should be aligned. The input fields underneath should also be aligned in some way I think.

Author: mole99
Content: I did receive the confirmation email and it is mostly fine. I suppose you cannot easily change the text? Or is the localization data part of your repository?

Author: mithro_
Content: The localization must be a thing that comes with the social auth plugin...

Author: mithro_
Content: I didn't even think about localization

Author: mole99
Content:
The process to sign up was very clear. I did not run into any issues.
Is the precheck already integrated? I will give it a try later.

We should probably also tell some suggested ways to upload the layout.
It is not recommnded to host it in the repository as this bloats the git history. Better to create a release with the layout attached.

We should also link to the project template.

Author: mithro_
Content: The downloading bit works, running the precheck is the next step.

Author: mole99
Content: All right, let me know when I can give it a try!
